Sthapatya Software Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 08 March 2016.
It is classified as a Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai.
The company's authorized share capital is Rs. 100,000 and its paid-up capital is Rs. 100,000.
Sthapatya Software Private Limited is primarily involved in Software publishing, consultancy, and supply.
Software publishing includes production, supply, and documentation of ready-made (non-customized) software, operating systems software, business & other applications software, computer games software for all platforms.
Consultancy includes providing the best solution in the form of custom software after analyzing the user's needs and problems.
Custom software also includes made-to-order software based on orders from specific users. Also, included are writing of software of any kind following directives of the users; software maintenance, web-page design.
The company's Annual General Meeting (AGM) was last held on 30 September 2022, and its balance sheet was last filed on 31 March 2022.
The Directors of Sthapatya Software Private Limited are Prashant Ramdas Doifode and Suraj Digambar Mandlik.
Sthapatya Software Private Limited's Corporate Identification Number is (CIN) U72200MH2016PTC274063 and its registration number is 274063.
Its Email address is sthapatyaconsultants@gmail.com, and its registered address is 4B, Saitirth Apartment, Abhinav Colony, Shegaon Road, Amravati, Maharashtra 444603, India.
The current status of Sthapatya Software Private Limited is - Active.

At Sthapatya Consultants (I) Pvt. Ltd., we provide a range of services:
- Property Survey & Tax Assessment
- Tax Collection
- Software Development
- Android Application Development
- GIS (Geographic Information System)
- IT Security Assessment
- Application Security
- Mobile Application Security
- Network Security
- Audit Compliance
